Paragraph.Text: Uses multiple Advanced Machine Blocks and a MK5 Power Booster to create a compact but powerfull component.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 3 Advanced Machine Blocks and 1 MK5 Power Booster to start the imbuing process.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Temps de Fabrication: Energie Requise: Capacité Energie: Max. Taux de Recharge:
